response.overview: Brett Garsed is known for his work with multi-platinum artists such as John Farnham, Olivia Newton-John and Nelson as well as his albums with TJ Helmerich, Frank Gambale and Shawn Lane. Here Brett give up-close demonstrations of his hybrid picking technique, left hand legato and also his unique approach to slide guitar as well as improvisation concepts for the intermediate to advanced rock/fusion guitarist. With over 40 minutes of live footage as well as 1 hour of personal tuition, this DVD is a must for the thinking musician.
response.title: Brett Garsed: Rock Guitar Improvisation
